alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Macon; Monroe; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:48PM EDT until April 05 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Macon County in west central Georgia... Western Bibb County in central Georgia... Monroe County in central Georgia... Central Peach County in central Georgia... Crawford County in central Georgia... West central Jones County in central Georgia... Eastern Taylor County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Lamar County in west central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 248 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Forsyth to near Roberta to Garden Valley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Forsyth, Roberta, Marshallville, Reynolds, Culloden, Nakomis, Lake Tobesofkee, Russellville, Collier, Horns, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Brent, Hicks, Musella, Potterville, Jarrell Plantation, Knoxville and Redbone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Macon; Monroe; Peach; Taylor
